FINALLY! Was able to finish PMK last night.... Watched all last 5 
episodes non-stop. I don't know personally I think it was rushed, 
but I liked it nonetheless.... Somehow though, my favorite character 
changed from Susumu to Suzu. I feel so sorry for him... The ending 
definitely gives good way for a second series which might not be too 
far off if ADV does license the anime... 

No one ever answered my question before whether the Anime started 
with the Shinsengumi Imon Peacemaker or Peacemaker Kurogane manga. 
I'm just curious because I'd like to see a second season an was 
curious what that might contain...

Anyway, while watching Hijikata's interrogation of that store owner, 
I remembered a few weeks ago I posted a bus tour here in the mailing 
list. The reason I did that was because it had very interesting 
photos on the Maekawa residence particularly the storehouse where 
they did the interrogation of prisoners. The site is in Japanese and 
I can't find it in my bookmarks right now... Sorry, I'll put it up 
once I find it. Anyway, the pics are in the location section of the 
photos.
